languages.text: "По правилам вся переодетая чернь должна показаться зрителям в финале, чтобы мы знали, кто смог изобразить настоящего дворянина. Потому здесь есть и те лицемеры... которых вы изволили не отметить". {n}Руолдо нервно оттягивает пальцем впившийся в шею золоченый воротник.{/n} "Так что же... Вы подарите Тассере пару напутственных слов?"

"According to the rules, all disguised commoners must be shown to the audience in the finale, so that we know who managed to pass themselves off as a real noble. That is why there are impostors... whom you chose not to mark." {n}Ruoldo nervously tugs at his gilded collar, which is digging into his neck.{/n} "Now then... Will you bestow a few parting words upon Thassera?"
languages.original_text: "По правилам вся переодетая чернь должна показаться зрителям в финале, чтобы мы знали, кто смог изобразить настоящего дворянина. Потому здесь есть и те лицемеры... которых вы изволили не отметить". {n}Руолдо нервно оттягивает пальцем впившийся в шею золоченый воротник.{/n} "Так что же... Вы подарите Тассере пару напутственных слов?"

That is why there are impostors... whom you chose not to mark." {n}Ruoldo nervously tugs at his gilded collar, which is digging into his neck.{/n} "Now then... languages.text: "Den Regeln zufolge müssen alle verkleideten einfachen Bürger im Finale dem Publikum präsentiert werden, damit wir wissen, wem es gelungen ist, sich als echter Adel auszugeben. Darum gibt es auch Hochstapler ... die Ihr nicht markiert habt." {n}Ruoldo nestelt nervös an seinem vergoldeten Kragen, der tief in seinen Hals hinab reicht.{/n} "Also dann ... möchtet Ihr einige Abschiedsworte an Thassera richten?"
languages.original_text: "According to the rules, all disguised commoners must be shown to the audience in the finale, so that we know who managed to pass themselves off as a real noble. That is why there are impostors... whom you chose not to mark." {n}Ruoldo nervously tugs at his gilded collar, which is digging into his neck.{/n} "Now then... Will you bestow a few parting words upon Thassera?"

traits.locale_text: "Den Regeln zufolge müssen alle verkleideten einfachen Bürger im Finale dem Publikum präsentiert werden, damit wir wissen, wem es gelungen ist, sich als echter Adel auszugeben. Darum gibt es auch Hochstapler ... die Ihr nicht markiert habt." {n}Ruoldo nestelt nervös an seinem vergoldeten Kragen, der tief in seinen Hals hinab reicht.{/n} "Also dann ... möchtet Ihr einige Abschiedsworte an Thassera richten?"

languages.text: « Selon le règlement, tous les roturiers déguisés doivent défiler devant le public lors de la grande finale, pour que nous sachions qui a réussi à se faire passer pour un vrai noble. Voilà pourquoi il y a parmi nous des imposteurs... que vous avez choisi de ne pas marquer. » {n}Ruoldo tire nerveusement sur son col doré, qui lui rentre dans les plis du cou.{/n} « Sur ce... Souhaitez-vous adresser quelques mots d'adieu à Thassera ? »
languages.original_text: "According to the rules, all disguised commoners must be shown to the audience in the finale, so that we know who managed to pass themselves off as a real noble. That is why there are impostors... whom you chose not to mark." {n}Ruoldo nervously tugs at his gilded collar, which is digging into his neck.{/n} "Now then... Will you bestow a few parting words upon Thassera?"

traits.locale_text: « Selon le règlement, tous les roturiers déguisés doivent défiler devant le public lors de la grande finale, pour que nous sachions qui a réussi à se faire passer pour un vrai noble. Voilà pourquoi il y a parmi nous des imposteurs... que vous avez choisi de ne pas marquer. » {n}Ruoldo tire nerveusement sur son col doré, qui lui rentre dans les plis du cou.{/n} « Sur ce... Souhaitez-vous adresser quelques mots d'adieu à Thassera ? »

languages.text: “根据规则，所有冒充贵族的平民在游戏结束时，都必须在观众面前亮相，这样我们才能知道谁的表演骗过了所有人。正因如此，有一部分冒牌货……您没有打上印记。”{n}罗尔多紧张地拽了拽镀金的领子，领子上的金边已经刺到了他的脖子里。{/n}“既然如此……您能对塔瑟拉的人民说几句结束致辞吗？”
languages.original_text: "According to the rules, all disguised commoners must be shown to the audience in the finale, so that we know who managed to pass themselves off as a real noble. That is why there are impostors... whom you chose not to mark." {n}Ruoldo nervously tugs at his gilded collar, which is digging into his neck.{/n} "Now then... Will you bestow a few parting words upon Thassera?"

traits.locale_text: “根据规则，所有冒充贵族的平民在游戏结束时，都必须在观众面前亮相，这样我们才能知道谁的表演骗过了所有人。正因如此，有一部分冒牌货……您没有打上印记。”{n}罗尔多紧张地拽了拽镀金的领子，领子上的金边已经刺到了他的脖子里。{/n}“既然如此……您能对塔瑟拉的人民说几句结束致辞吗？”

languages.text: «Según las reglas, todos los plebeyos disfrazados deben revelarse ante la audiencia al final, para que sepamos quiénes han conseguido hacerse pasar por nobles de verdad. Por eso hay impostores... a los que decidió no marcar». {n}Ruoldo tira nervioso de su collar dorado, que se clava en su cuello.{/n} «Bueno... ¿dedicará unas últimas palabras a Thassera?».
languages.original_text: "According to the rules, all disguised commoners must be shown to the audience in the finale, so that we know who managed to pass themselves off as a real noble. That is why there are impostors... whom you chose not to mark." {n}Ruoldo nervously tugs at his gilded collar, which is digging into his neck.{/n} "Now then... Will you bestow a few parting words upon Thassera?"

traits.locale_text: «Según las reglas, todos los plebeyos disfrazados deben revelarse ante la audiencia al final, para que sepamos quiénes han conseguido hacerse pasar por nobles de verdad. Por eso hay impostores... a los que decidió no marcar». {n}Ruoldo tira nervioso de su collar dorado, que se clava en su cuello.{/n} «Bueno... ¿dedicará unas últimas palabras a Thassera?».

languages.text: 「ルールによれば、変装した平民たちは全員、フィナーレで観客に見せなければなりません。そうすることで、誰が本物の貴族に装えたのかが分かります。だからあなたが印をつけない偽者がいるのです」{n}ルオルドは首に食い込む金色の襟を神経質にいじりながら言う。{/n}「それでは…タッセーラに別れの言葉をかけていただけませんか？」
languages.original_text: "According to the rules, all disguised commoners must be shown to the audience in the finale, so that we know who managed to pass themselves off as a real noble. That is why there are impostors... whom you chose not to mark." {n}Ruoldo nervously tugs at his gilded collar, which is digging into his neck.{/n} "Now then... Will you bestow a few parting words upon Thassera?"

traits.locale_text: 「ルールによれば、変装した平民たちは全員、フィナーレで観客に見せなければなりません。そうすることで、誰が本物の貴族に装えたのかが分かります。だからあなたが印をつけない偽者がいるのです」{n}ルオルドは首に食い込む金色の襟を神経質にいじりながら言う。{/n}「それでは…タッセーラに別れの言葉をかけていただけませんか？」

languages.text: "Kurallara göre kılık değiştirenlerin finalde huzuruna çıkarılması gerekir. Böylece kimin gerçek bir asilzade gibi davranabildiğini anlarız. İşte... İşaretlememeyi seçtiğin sahtekârlar da bu yüzden buradalar." {n}Ruoldo, boynuna batıp duran yaldızlı yakasını sinirle çekiştiriyor.{/n} "Şimdi... Thassera'ya veda etmeden önce söyleyecek bir şeyin var mı?"
languages.original_text: "According to the rules, all disguised commoners must be shown to the audience in the finale, so that we know who managed to pass themselves off as a real noble. That is why there are impostors... whom you chose not to mark." {n}Ruoldo nervously tugs at his gilded collar, which is digging into his neck.{/n} "Now then... Will you bestow a few parting words upon Thassera?"

İşaretlememeyi seçtiğin sahtekârlar da bu yüzden buradalar." {n}Ruoldo, boynuna batıp duran yaldızlı yakasını sinirle çekiştirir.{/n} "Şimdi...
